channel.title: Editing my server
channel.description: ok , so i dont know how to edit my server , i mean , i got it all , but i dont know how to make the npcs to say my name if im online or offline, nd when people log in , i want to edit everything they see in the chat bar , u know , the welcome to (...) scape , and then it says some more sit , where do i find all of this , and by the way my source is fr33sc4p3 pkz
